title: How to Make a Citrus Bomb Smoothie

steps.headline: Ready your blender for use.
steps.description: Clean the blender if required, then plug it into a nearby outlet.

steps.headline: Put 1 cup of ice into the blender.
Put 1/4 cup of seedless, red grapes into the blender.
Put 1/2 a cup of a peeled and sliced clementine (a seedless, small orange) into the blender.
Put 1 yogurt cup of plain or vanilla yogurt into the blender.
Add 10 slices of a medium sliced banana.
steps.description: Make sure it's a ripe banana and peel it before you cut it up. If there's leftover banana, eat it or save it to make banana bread.

steps.headline: Add 1/3 cup of flax seeds.
steps.description: This addition is optional––put in or leave out the flax seeds at your own discretion.

steps.headline: Pour half a cup of cherry limeade into a clean measuring cup or jug.
steps.description: Make sure it is precisely 1/2 a cup for an authentic citrus bomb smoothie.

steps.headline: Pour half a cup of strawberry lemonade into the measuring cup.
steps.description: If you didn't notice, 1/2 cup is filled with cherry-limeade, and the other with strawberry-lemonade.

steps.headline: Stir the contents in the measuring cup.
steps.description: You have now mixed the two liquids.

steps.headline: Pour the liquid into the blender.
Blend.
steps.description: If you are not sure how to blend a smoothie, just press the "blend", "smoothie", or "shake" button. If you don't have such buttons, use the "puree" button.

text: Ready your blender for use. Clean the blender if required, then plug it into a nearby outlet. Put 1 cup of ice into the blender.  Put 1/4 cup of seedless, red grapes into the blender.  Put 1/2 a cup of a peeled and sliced clementine (a seedless, small orange) into the blender.  Put 1 yogurt cup of plain or vanilla yogurt into the blender.  Add 10 slices of a medium sliced banana. Make sure it's a ripe banana and peel it before you cut it up. If there's leftover banana, eat it or save it to make banana bread. Add 1/3 cup of flax seeds. This addition is optional––put in or leave out the flax seeds at your own discretion. Pour half a cup of cherry limeade into a clean measuring cup or jug. Make sure it is precisely 1/2 a cup for an authentic citrus bomb smoothie. Pour half a cup of strawberry lemonade into the measuring cup. If you didn't notice, 1/2 cup is filled with cherry-limeade, and the other with strawberry-lemonade. Stir the contents in the measuring cup. You have now mixed the two liquids. Pour the liquid into the blender.  Blend. If you are not sure how to blend a smoothie, just press the "blend", "smoothie", or "shake" button. If you don't have such buttons, use the "puree" button. Enjoy your new smoothie.
